snippet.title: The Assistant's Turnabout [FT] Full Game: I Should've Just Stayed Home
snippet.description:
[A Visual Novelty First-Time Playthrough]

A game about Phoenix Wright in his edgy phase doing something remarkably dumb and making a rather outrageous claim... on the surface.

Really the true nature of this story will only come out late in this journey, forcing us to think about just what the point of it was. As June says, perhaps we just should have stayed home after all, and never even taken this case. 

The premise of this case is interesting, though unfortunately the way it framed this around a mystery this intentionally frustrating took me out of the story by the end. If I played this again knowing the story it was trying to be, I'd probably appreciate it a lot more, but on the merits of a first-time playthrough, this is what we've got, and I apologize for that.

Play this case for yourself! https://aaonline.fr/player.php?trial_id=67761

Watch more fangames from me! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLaW1SKhhC603QTjdxirWYw0wcFjqnpW8v
Or watch a more successful channel play this case! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mPrxCHOx9tg&list=PLYUgf9vbpM41uD0fUfnptb7Rb_U91T1N7&index=5
